entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 9:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: ESE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
